title: AP invoice import error: taxes not derived
rootCause: Supplier site tax options misconfigured; Term Date Basis not aligned with requirement.
preChecks: Verify Supplier Site → Invoicing tax options
Check Tax Regime subscription & party tax profiles
steps: Update Supplier Site Invoicing options (Term Date Basis/Payment Terms).
Fix Supplier/Party Tax Profile classification codes.
Re-import invoice or test with a new invoice.

title: GL journal cannot be posted due to sequencing mismatch
rootCause: Ledger/seq assignment not aligned to ledger calendar period.

title: Payment Process Request not generating format output
rootCause: Payment format mapping or transmission configuration missing.
steps: Assign correct payment format at Payment Process Profile.
validation: Payment file generated and transmitted successfully

title: AR AutoCash rules not applying during receipt application
rootCause: AutoCash rule set not attached to customer profile or rule priority incorrect.

title: AP invoice approval not triggered
rootCause: BPM task configuration inactive or rule condition mismatch.

title: GL account combination invalidated by segment value security
rootCause: Segment value security rule newly applied.

title: Payment file rejected by bank due to date format
rootCause: Bank requires yyyyMMdd; format template outputs dd/MM/yyyy.

title: AR Credit Memo approval stuck in Assigned state
rootCause: Approver vacation rule without delegate.

title: AP Withholding Tax not calculated
rootCause: Supplier/site WHT classification missing.

title: GL posting fails: period closed
rootCause: Target period status is Closed.
steps: Open period or change journal date

title: AR Transaction source missing during AutoInvoice
rootCause: Transaction Source not defined/mapped.

title: Payment Process Profile not available at PPR
rootCause: PPP not assigned to Business Unit or payment method.

title: Cash Management reconciliation rules not matching
rootCause: Rule thresholds wrong; bank statement date offsets.

title: SLA: Journal approvals not respecting amount threshold
rootCause: Approval rule uses currency-agnostic amount without conversion.
steps: Convert to functional currency before compare

title: AP Invoice image not visible in Infolets
rootCause: Attachment category not included in infolet query.

title: AR Lockbox rejects receipts with MICR missing
rootCause: Bank file missing MICR; mapping expecting mandatory field.
steps: Make MICR optional or enrich mapping

title: Tax: Rounding difference posted to suspense
rootCause: Tax precision/rounding config mismatch.

title: Approvals: BPM task not created for Payment Cancellation
rootCause: Payment cancellation task disabled.

title: GL Balance cube not refreshed after segment change
rootCause: Cube not recompiled after hierarchy update.

title: AP: Invoice lines missing distribution combination
rootCause: Default distribution not set at supplier/site.

title: AR: Revenue recognition schedule not generated
rootCause: Invoicing rule/RevRec rule not attached.

title: Payments: Supplier banking validation fails (IBAN)
rootCause: IBAN validation routine country config outdated.

title: SLA: Subledger accounting entries out of balance
rootCause: Journal line rule source expression returns null.

title: Approvals: Parallel approver not notified
rootCause: Notification preference disabled for user.

title: AP: Dunning / Late charges not calculated
rootCause: Late charge policy not enabled for supplier/site.
